post.text: The corrupt establishment knows that we are a great threat to their criminal enterprise. We will NOT let them decide our future â€“ YOU, the American people will decide OUR future!

comment.author: Emily
comment.text: Mr. Trump, I hope you have a card up your sleeve because we are going to need more than what we have to get you to the White House. I am not referring to the polls. We need at least Florida and Ohio. Does any one agree with me?

replies.author: Jared
replies.text: Lady you shouldn't even vote. Your too senile.

replies.author: Victoria
replies.text: It's not a card he needs but a whole deck up each sleeve !!!

replies.author: Kelsea
replies.text: I'm not worried. The polls are completely biased in favor of Clinton. I'm guessing we'll see a turnout for Trump like we've never seen before.

replies.author: Emily
replies.text: Jared , I am a big Trump supporter, but we are going to need to get control of a couple of the states, and without the GOP's help we may not. Clinton has almost all the states she needs, and we are a ways off. I don't mean this as a nasty reply, but I am worried about this election.

replies.author: Emily
replies.text: Victoria , I think you are right. I hate it but I do agree. trump when ask about no GOP support shrugged it off and said, "They will be there". I hope he is right, but I don't see it so far.
